head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WESSLER, DR. STANFORD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WESSLER, DR. STANFORD

block.p: WESSLER--Dr. Stanford, 87, predeceased by his wife of 60 years, Margaret Muhlfelder Wessler. Survived by three sons, John of Andover, MA; Steve of Litchfield, ME; and Jim of Auburndale, MA. Dr. Wessler was Associate Dean for Post Graduate Programs, New York University School of Medicine. Information H.L. Farmer & Sons, Haverhill, MA., phone 978-372-9311.

WESSLER--Dr. Stanford, 87, predeceased by his wife of 60 years, Margaret Muhlfelder Wessler. Survived by three sons, John of Andover, MA; Steve of Litchfield, ME; and Jim of Auburndale, MA. Dr. Wessler was Associate Dean for Post Graduate Programs, New York University School of Medicine. Information H.L. Farmer & Sons, Haverhill, MA., phone 978-372-9311.
